explanation: Einstein's special theory of relativity revolutionized our understanding of space, time, mass, and energy. It establishes that the laws of physics are identical in all inertial reference frames, and the speed of light in vacuum is constant for all observers. The theory unifies space and time into spacetime, introduces length contraction and time dilation, and reveals the equivalence of mass and energy.
